text: José Fernando Ferreira Pinto (born 7 November 1939 in Benguela, Portuguese Angola) is a retired Portuguese footballer who played as a midfielder. ==External links== * * *Portugal stats at Eu-Football * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:People from Benguela Category:Portuguese people of Angolan descent Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Sporting CP footballers Category:G.D.
